about_the_game:
Grandpa’s Bee Haven is an engaging idle-beekeeping simulator designed to sit at the bottom of your screen while you multitask. Your mission? Help Grandpa grow his beekeeping business into a real beekeeping haven. Work together with Grandpa’s helpers to produce unique bee resources and craft amazing bee products!

Set Up Your Apiary

Strategically place beehives in ideal locations and populate them with different bee species. Ensure your bees thrive by adding nearby watering stations, honey extractors for harvesting, and solar wax melters for collecting beeswax. Once you’ve planned the layout, Grandpa and his helpers will get to work building and assembling everything.

Produce and Upgrade

Unlock hive upgrades to generate valuable resources like honey, pollen, beeswax, propolis, and royal jelly. Use these resources to invest in further upgrades or craft unique products.

Craft Unique Products

Transform the fruits of your bees’ labor into delightful and useful items. Make beeswax candles, propolis medicine for example to enhance your income and diversify your offerings.

Hire Helpers

Expand the bee haven team with charming helpers! Recruit Grandma, a Scientist, a Shaman, or even a loyal Dog or Cat. Helpers have different capabilities: Grandma boosts production alongside with Grandpa, while the Scientist unlocks advanced upgrades.

Design Your Bee Paradise

Create a stunning bee-garden that reflects your style. Be a perfectionist or get really creative with flowers, lush bushes, and beautiful trees.

short_description: Welcome to Grandpa’s Bee Haven! A charming 2D idle beekeeping simulator where you help Grandpa embark on his beekeeping journey by buying and placing different beehives, upgrading them, unlocking new hive types and bee species, hiring helpers, and finally decorating your beekeeping haven.
